turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I want to place an order for delivery.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a large pepperoni and jalapeno on one side, and the other side I would like spinach and mushroom.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Just to clarify, you want one pizza with two sets of toppings on it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, we can have that right up for you. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would also like to order buffalo wings.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will that be boneless or bone in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Boneless.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely. Anything else for you this evening?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm not sure. What are your specials right now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well, we have a few based on what you already ordered.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, what are they?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We have a buy one get one half off for large pizzas.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That sounds really good! Can I get another large, this one with only pepperoni and banana pepper?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely. So just to be sure, that's 1 large pizza with pepperoni and jalapeno on one side, and on the other side spinach and mushroom. One large with pepperoni and banana pepper, and a 2 liter of Pepsi.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your total will be $37.90. Will that be cash or card?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Cash upon delivery please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: We'll have that to you within 30 to 45 minutes.
